lead_paragraph: As campaign documents revealed a spending gap between Mr. Trump and Hillary Clinton, some Republican leaders called for focusing resources on candidates down the ballot.

byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and RACHEL SHOREY

headline.print_headline: Trump Campaign Relying on G.O.P. for Vital Tasks
headline.main: Donald Trump, With Bare-Bones Campaign, Relies on G.O.P. for Vital Tasks

snippet: As campaign documents revealed a spending gap between Mr. Trump and Hillary Clinton, some Republican leaders called for focusing resources on candidates down the ballot....
abstract: Donald J Trump's presidential campaign is relying heavily on Republican Party organizations to help carry out crucial campaign functions like get-out-the-vote efforts, fund-raising and digital outreach; campaign has remained largely bare-bones, despite increase in amount of cash it has on hand, and many Republicans are urging party officials to divert resources to fight to retain majorities in Congress.
